operation.descriptionCdata:
2eaae3ea-6b7f-442d-a6b4-a0553b519a76.description=Processes a list.

Input parameters\:
\=\=\=\=\=\=\=\=\=\=\=\=\=\=\=\=\=
$tabledata\: initialized with the table data
$rowsep\: the row separator for the table data, e.g. '
' or '
'
$colsep\: the column separator for the table data, e.g. ',' or '	'
$order\: specifies whether the table is to be sorted in ascending or descending
 order; either "asc" (ascending) or "desc" (descending)
$col\: specifies the 0-based column number (int) according to
 which the table is to be sorted
$type\: specifies the type of the sort column; either "alpha" or "int" 
 or "float" or "nosort" (table is not sorted, but can be filtered)
$threshold\: specifies a filter value for table rows; semantic depends on $order\:
 "asc"\: all rows with columns smaller than $threshold
 "desc"\: all rows with columns greater than $threshold
$minrow\: >\= 0; specifies the first row of the sorted table that is in the result
 table
$maxrow\: specifies the last row of the sorted table that is in the result tab
$esctable\: whether to convert escaped characters in the table (true/false) (i.e. convert \t to an actual tab)

Responses\:
success - the list was processed.
operation.name: List Processor

scriptlet.name: Operation List Processor (f589ceef-46b1-4fd6-add3-6ff11aa2dcec)
